config.minihume.do_adjusted_render: Player render is more normal at small sizes, but may cause problems with other mods
config.minihume.pickup_small_entities: Enable/disable the ability to pick up small entities
config.minihume.pickup_small_entities.to: Can players pick up smaller entities?
config.minihume.ride_big_entities: Enable/disable the ability to ride large entities with String
config.minihume.ride_big_entities.toolti: Can small players ride bigger entities with String?
config.minihume.climb_some_blocks: Enable/disable the ability to climb some blocks (dirt, grass, leaves, etc)
config.minihume.climb_with_slime: Enable/disable the ability to climb with Slimeballs or Slime Blocks
config.minihume.climb_with_slime.tooltip: Can small players climb with Slimeballs/Slime Blocks?
config.minihume.glide_with_paper: Enable/disable the ability to glide with paper
config.minihume.glide_with_paper.tooltip: Can small players glide with paper?
config.minihume.hot_blocks_give_lift: Enable/disable hot blocks giving gliding players lift (requires the ability to glide with paper to be enabled)
config.minihume.roses_hurt.tooltip: Do Rose Bushes/Poppies hurt small players?
config.minihume.plants_slow_small_down: Enable/disable plants slowing down small players
config.minihume.plants_slow_small_down.t: Do small players get slowed by plants?
config.minihume.small_is_invisible_to_no: Enable/disable the ability for small players to be unnoticed by non-ocelots and non-spiders
Are small players undetected by non-ocelots/non-spiders?
config.minihume.giants_crush_entities: Enable/disable the ability for giants to crush small entities
config.minihume.scaled_fall_damage.toolt: Does fall damage scale with size?
config.minihume.harvest_modifier: Habilitar/deshabilitar el modificador de velocidad de cosecha
